GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Follow up on missed Capital Call
GenAiPromptTemplate.masterLabel: Follow up on missed Capital Call

templateVersions.content: You are a fund manager at Growth Heaven. Draft an email to follow up on the missed capital call to a limited partner. Add personalised details about the contact. Keep the tone positive and exciting. The result should be in english. Limited partner name should be {!$Input:Recipient.Name} fund manager name should be {!$Input:Sender.Name} Add the capital calls details in the email. Amount : {!$Input:Capital_Call__c.Capital_Call_Amount__c}, Commitment Account : {!$Input:Capital_Call__c.Commitment_Account__r.Name}, Due Date : {!$Input:Capital_Call__c.Due_Date__c}
